channel.title: Npc & cord
channel.description:
ók guys, thanks for tryıng to help me or helpıng me.
i was wondering how i can use to move the npc's & home area, iff you can help me it will be very hellfull thanks again.

item.title: Npc & cord
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

[quote=“kirmizi_kalp, post:1, topic:270350”]i was wondering how i can use to move the npc’s & home area,
iff you can help me it will be very hellfull thanks again.[/quote]

To move the NPC’s use Autospawn.Cfg

you should see something like this

spawn = 6063 2522 2920 0 2523 2926 2521 2920 Ninja Imp spawn = 6062 2523 2924 0 2523 2926 2521 2920 Magpie Imp spawn = 6056 2532 2916 0 2536 2918 2532 2913 Young Imp spawn = 6055 2534 2914 0 2536 2918 2532 2913 Baby Imp spawn = 6055 2536 2917 0 2536 2918 2532 2913 Baby Imp spawn = 6056 2539 2926 0 2544 2928 2537 2923 Young Imp spawn = 6064 2543 2926 0 2544 2928 2537 2923 Dragon Imp spawn = 6056 2541 2924 0 2544 2928 2537 2923 Young Imp spawn = 6062 2524 2934 0 2531 2936 2515 2932 Magpie Imp spawn = 6063 2516 2935 0 2531 2936 2515 2932 Ninja Imp spawn = 6062 2521 2937 0 2531 2936 2515 2932 Young Imp
[size=18pt]DO NOT ADD THIS TO YOUR AUTOSPAWN.CFG AS THIS IS FOR A 508[/size]

and to change the home area you will need to change the home command wich can be done by opening your client.Java and searching(Ctrl+f) for “home” Then change the old co-ords to the co-ords of your new Home area…

I hope i helped

Read full topic
